ISSUE.TITLE: DeadLetterJobQuery.externalWorkers() filters on timers in stead of externalWorkers
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the bug** DeadLetterJobQuery.externalWorkers() filters on timers in stead of externalWorkers **Expected behavior** DeadLetterJobQuery.externalWorkers() filters on externalWorkers **Code** managementService.createDeadLetterJobQuery().externalWorkers() **Additional context** Flowable 6.7.2 and 6.7.3-SNAPSHOT

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Provide additional Resolver for script evaluation (#3410) Introduce ScriptEngineRequest and related Builder for future extensions Introduce an easy-to-use implementation of VariableContainer which can be used as-is or define transient (local) variables and delegate to another VariableContainer

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Corrected dead letter job query external worker filter (#3415)
Corrected dead letter job query external worker filter (#3415) (#3416)
